text: The women's pentathlon event at the 1978 Commonwealth Games was held on 6 August at the Commonwealth Stadium in Edmonton, Alberta, Canada. This was the last time that this event was contested at the Commonwealth Games, four years later being replaced by the heptathlon. ==Results== {| class="wikitable sortable" style=" text-align:center; font-size:92%" |- !Rank !Athlete !Nationality !100m H !SP !HJ !LJ !800m !Points !Notes |- | ||align=left| Diane Jones-Konihowski ||align=left| || 13.85 || 14.87 || 1.88 || 6.41 || 2:12.1 || 4768 || GR |- | ||align=left| Sue Mapstone ||align=left| || 14.17 || 11.32 || 1.75 || 6.06 || 2:19.3 || 4222 || |- | ||align=left| Yvette Wray ||align=left| || 14.16 || 12.15 || 1.64 || 6.04 || 2:15.6 || 4211 || |- | ||align=left| Jill Ross ||align=left| || || || || || || 4205 || |- | ||align=left| Karen Page ||align=left| || || || || || || 4099 || |- | ||align=left| Ruth Howell ||align=left| || || || || || || 4022 || |- | ||align=left| Barbara Beable ||align=left| || || || || || || 3989 || |- | ||align=left| Julie White ||align=left| || || || || || || 3940 || |- | ||align=left| Wendy Phillips ||align=left| || || || || || || 3594 || |- | 10 ||align=left| Jennifer Swanston ||align=left| || || || || || || 3517 || |- | ||align=left| Glynis Saunders ||align=left| || 14.45 || 11.34 || || || || ' || |} ==References== * Final results (The Sydney Morning Herald) * Final results (The Canberra Times) * Australian results Category:Athletics at the 1978 Commonwealth Games 1982
title: Athletics at the 1978 Commonwealth Games – Women's pentathlon
